content.description: Only bolted line on Power Plant.  Rated 5.10d in the Ruckmans' guide.  Good climbing, but a bit of looseness down low and a small amount of critter poo to avoid.
content.protection: Draws and a 1 ½ or 2 inch cam to protect the moves to the first bolt.  Belay from bolts; walk down.
content.location: Look for the only bolts on the crag.

content.description:
Short but enjoyable face climb near the center of Power Plant Wall (see photo topo).  Protects surprisingly well, although the crux moves at the top are protected by a shallow-placed blue camalot that you wouldn't want to see blow out -- but, hey, its quartzite.  Put up by accident; we thought we were on

Pipeline Sequence

, but once we consulted the Ruckmans' 1998 guide, the light came on, so to speak.
content.protection:
Single set of cams from micros to 2 ½ inches.  Belay from bolts on top of

Pipeline Sequence/Steepness

and walk off.
content.location: See photo topo.  The routes shown in the Ruckmans' guide are all to the right.
